item.title: Hunting for work in `Tech`
item.description: I’m up, getting back into a routine, I’ve walked the dog already. It’s cold out there. He didn’t fancy it, so I didn’t have to go too far. I’ll be commuting soon when I start my new contract - best get used to early starts. So having a bit of time on my hands, I wanted to share what my experience has been like, looking for a new role over the last 5 weeks.
